actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry with amendment, S. Rept. 93-815.
Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for two additional Assistant Secretaries of Agriculture; to increase the compensation of certain officials of the Department of Agriculture; to provide for an additional member of the Board of Directors, Commodity Credit Corporation.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Changes the title of the Under Secretary of Agriculture to the Deputy Secretary of Agriculture; and raises his salary from Level III to Level II of the Executive Schedule. Provides for two additional Assistant Secretaries of Agriculture who shall be appointed by the President with the advise and consent of the Senate. Provides compensation for the Assistant Secretaries of Agriculture at Level IV of the Executive Schedule in lieu of that provided by present Federal law. Deletes from level V of the Executive Schedule the positions of: (1) the Assistant Secretary of Agriculture for Administration, (2) the Director of Agricultural Economics, Department of Agriculture, and (3) the Director of Science and Education, Department of Agriculture. Abolishes the position of Administrative Assistant Secretary of Agriculture. Increases the number of members of the Board of Directors of the Commodity Credit Corporation from six (in addition to the Secretary) to seven (in addition to the Secretary).

titles.title: A bill to provide for two additional Assistant Secretaries of Agriculture; to increase the compensation of certain officials of the Department of Agriculture; to provide for an additional member of the Board of Directors, Commodity Credit Corporation.
